### Quick demo?
No pressure! But if it's a visual or code issue, these help a ton:
- [CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io)
- [JSFiddle](https://jsfiddle.net)
- [CodePen](https://codepen.io)
- Or just paste relevant code snippets below
